body: Amazing_reading

Stepmother and son were trash. I wish Shinomiya left him. Only in hentai can we have an ending where he gets both women. But damn was this hot. The step mom is like my favourite type of manga women when it comes to looks, especially the hair.
@jkmj   for me its more netorare for the second girl but yes for the father too
How to download and why i can't download it
If just the father join in would been awesome

Well, for me, it is a bad Netorare for the father. But since he isn't the MC, that makes it less painful than it should be. Still felt bad for him though. As a Vanilla Lover myself, I think this is tolerable and is actually much better than actual NTRs out there. Go ahead and give it a try.

This was neither netori nor netorare, simple cheating while both step mom and gf trying to seduce the mc. 

From the looks of it, step-mom had feeling for both father and son and probably because of that said 'this is the end... Sorry' since she didn't want to leave anyone but when father kicked the mc out and probably wanted a divorce, she end up choosing MC. It could also be the reason why she end up not minding the 3p relation at end. Well, that's how I interpreted it.
Good and nice ending
WELL AT LEAST NICE ENDING LOL..
Though NTR, this is a result I can accept. As long as it ain't Heavy then by all means. Cuck the bastard that deserves getting cucked.

There's just something I don't like about this one. I just feel the mum doesn't really love him. She says she's a slut flat out. She felt like the villain to me the whole time. She sees him watching then suddenly decides "I want to fuck him and I love him?" Guess she truly is a slut. With absolutely no regard for his current relationship. Who also takes, him fucking his stepmother, rather well for some reason. All in all, 5/10 is the best I could give it. Art was fine btw.
